title: Scotiabank Giller Prize finalists to be revealed today
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION Scotiabank Giller Prize finalists to be revealed today By: The Canadian Press Report Error 
TORONTO - The short list for the Scotiabank Giller Prize will be revealed this morning in Toronto. 
A long list of 12 authors, including Marina Endicott, Patrick deWitt and Heather O'Neill, was announced last month in Montreal by last year's Giller winner, Sean Michaels. 
Their novels were selected from a crop of 168 books submitted by 63 publishers. 
The annual prize awards $100,000 to the author of the best Canadian novel or short story collection published in English. Each finalist gets $10,000. 
The prize was established in 1994 by businessman Jack Rabinovitch in honour of his late wife, literary journalist Doris Giller.
